tool_description: Seamlessly retrieve and access diverse GitHub repository data through a single, intuitive api.
name: GitFetch API
title: GitFetch API

api_list.name: Get single repo details
api_list.description: Get the detailed information of a particular repository.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gitfetch-api.p.rapidapi.com/repodetails/facebook/react"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gitfetch-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gitfetch-api.p.rapidapi.com/repodetails/{owner}/{repo}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gitfetch-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search repo using forks
api_list.description: Search the repos which has forks greater than provided number.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gitfetch-api.p.rapidapi.com/searchreposbyforks/javascript/50000"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gitfetch-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gitfetch-api.p.rapidapi.com/searchreposbyforks/{language}/{forks}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gitfetch-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get trending repo
api_list.description: Get the detailed information of top 100 volatile repositories past 30 days.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gitfetch-api.p.rapidapi.com/trendingrepos"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gitfetch-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Top Repos
api_list.description: Get the top 100 Repositories from the Github.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gitfetch-api.p.rapidapi.com/toprepos"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gitfetch-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
